name: covid-map
description: COVID-19 map of available hospital beds

scripts.build-css: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css
scripts.build: npm-run-all create-dist build-html build-css build-js copy-external-deps copy-assets
scripts.copy-external-deps: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css && make-dir dist/js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js dist/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js dist/js
scripts.watch: npm-run-all build --parallel watch-dist watch-html watch-scss watch-js
